Steps.HTML:
Informational

  • To document events that occurred for an official record
  • To educate the reader on the details of a particular subject
  • Do I need to plan what I’m going to write or can I simply begin?
  • To accompany a presentation with background information, research, evidence etc. that would be too detailed for an audience to listen to

Analytical

  • To organize and record your knowledge or understanding of a specific topic
  • To provide the answer to a particular question

Persuasive

  • To recommend a particular strategy or solution based on the findings of the report
  • To evaluate the success of a completed project or a strategy that’s already been implemented
